channel.title: Tiny Web Server on Jifan's Blog

item.title: Tiny Web Server: Problems Encountered
item.description: 1. MySQL Error in log file Server stopped immediately after running ./server in shell, and output an error MySQL Error in log file. Find the source of the error: Although the error log is fairly vague, it’s not difficult to find out that it was thrown by the function connection_pool::init in the file CGImysql/sql_connection_pool.cpp. mysql_init(): return an initialized MYSQL* handler (i.e. a MYSQL object suitable for mysql_real_connect()), or NULL in case of insufficient memory.
